text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-family: Khand; font-size: 40.2325px; fill: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke: rgb(136, 136, 136); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: middle; font-family: Khand; font-size: 40.2325px; fill: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke: rgb(136, 136, 136); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
font-family: Khand; text-anchor: middle; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
font-family: Gochi Hand; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
text.tspan: Josepha "Wizard357" Amberline, Virtual Adept Mage

text.style: font-family: Khand; text-anchor: middle; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
font-family: Gochi Hand; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
text.tspan: You remember everything

text.style: font-family: Khand; text-anchor: middle; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
font-family: Gochi Hand; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
text.tspan: Remove 5 Knowledge points at creation

text.style: font-family: Khand; text-anchor: middle; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
font-family: Gochi Hand; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
text.tspan: Contacts à 0 à la création du personnage. Contrainte des
Wendigos. L'isolement du personnage fonctionne bien avec cette
contrainte. C'est une contrainte à la création du personnage, ça
peut évoluer ensuite.

text.style: font-family: Khand; text-anchor: middle; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
font-family: Gochi Hand; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
text.tspan: Resources à 0 à la création du personnage.Contrainte des
Wendigos. On partira du principe que le garage rapporte, mais
entre les dons à l'orphelinat et les frais de fonctionnement, tu
peines à avoir un revenu. C'est une contrainte à la création du
personnage, ça peut évoluer ensuite.

text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-family: Khand; font-size: 40.2325px; fill: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke: rgb(136, 136, 136); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 22.7984px; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68);
text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 22.7984px; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
text.tspan: -- Galliard gift
The werewolf may instinctively understand and communicate with
any natural animals, from fish to mammals. She need only speak
normally to be understood by animals, along with a touch of
appropriate body language — there is no need to bark like a dog.
This Gift doesn’t change animals’ basic reactions or dispositions;
most are still afraid of predators such as werewolves. Any animal
spirit can teach this Gift.
-- System
This Gift’s effects are permanent.

text.style: font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 22.7984px; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68);
text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 22.7984px; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
text.tspan: -- Homid gift
To creatures of the wild, man’s scent is death. To creatures of the
city, it is authority, comfort, easy meals. This Gift, taught by an
ancestor-spirit, enhances a werewolf’s human scent, infusing it with
spiritual power.
-- System
Non-supernatural wild animals lose two dice from their dice pools
when interacting with the Garou, save when defending themselves
or running away, and will be inclined to flee rather than attack if
possible. Domesticated animals recognize the werewolf as a friend,
and even trained attack dogs will do no more than wag their tails
at the character unless attacked first. This Gift’s effects are
permanently active.

text.style: font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 22.7984px; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68);
text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 22.7984px; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
text.tspan: -- Uktenas gift
The Garou calls up a strong (~20 mph/36kph), cold breeze and directs
it at whim. This breeze chills anyone not prepared for it and it
disperses (or redirects) clouds of vapor (including tear gas or
airborne toxins) or swarms of insects. A wind-spirit teaches this Gift.
-- System
The Garou simply whistles to call the breeze. Anyone caught in it
loses one die from Perception rolls as long as the breeze lasts, and
suffers a –1 penalty to all actions after one minute of exposure if not
dressed appropriately for cold weather.

text.style: text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 22.7984px; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: end; font-family: Philosopher; font-size: 22.7984px; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: end; font-family: Philosopher; font-size: 22.7984px; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: start; font-family: Philosopher; font-size: 17.4341px; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: end; font-family: Philosopher; font-size: 17.4341px; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.5pt;

g.text: WaWWoD Cross+Over Sheet 11.08 ©2024, Red Fox Studios.
